name: quintus-boilerplate
description: Template based on Yeoman's web app template. Comes with Sass & Susy, compass sprites, LiveReload, optional Coffeescript. Clone the repo, enter the directory, run 'npm install', run 'grunt server', check out the game in your browser. This is a working prototype, it has only been tested on OS X Mountain Lion. Please submit your reports if there are problems on other OS'es.
